title: Company of Heroes 634 Mappack! Blitzkrieg Mod
description:
Just download the mappack and extract the files to your company of heroes relaunch scenario folder found in your documents 


(looks something like 
this:  C:UsersBrandonDocumentsmy gamesCompany of Heroes Relaunchww2scenarios).

if that doesn't work, then youll have to put them in your game exe folder. For example, if you are playing blitzkrieg mod and the maps are not working rom your documents folder, then youw ould place these in a directory path similar to this :

C:Program Files (x86)SteamsteamappscommonCompany of Heroes RelaunchBlitzkriegArchivesMaps
